::Shadow Wing::

She turned and looked at Lunarpine. She looked into those charming 
eyes of his.
"Look, I'm an owl and your a wolf.  That right there making this 
difficult.  We are two different species right now."
She knelt down and put the scanner on the floor.  She moved to face 
Lunarpine.
"I know that a social creature, like the wolf, wil get lonely after a 
while if there are no other creatures like it around.  I too am 
lonely for the other owls back in the old forest.  So I thought that 
if I changed into a wolf, I could make you happier."  she smiled and 
looked at him with careing in her eyes.
"I just wanted to make you happy. And if this works, maybe I'll even 
see you smile once in a while too."
She picked up the scanner and started walking down the hallway.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine held still for a moment while Shadow Wing scanned him. 
The 
> hum of the scanner causing soothing vibrations through his body.
> 
> He tranformed back to bot and started to follow her back to the CR 
> room. He heard what she said about being a wolf. "You're what?" 
> Lunarpine didn't know exactly what to think, "Just what are you 
> thinking?" He was beginning to get upset "Why the Pit would you 
want 
> to do something like that for?" 
> 
> He decided to let her explain herself before he jumped to 
conclusions.
> 
> (These two should be a couple, they're either loving each other or 
> arguing about something.)
> (One of these days Shadow Wing POW To the Moon:)
> I gotta go do laundry, we'll pick up this argument later.
> 
> 
>
